rules_text:
Flying, haste
Whenever Adoroth, the Baneful attacks, forebode. [i](Create a tapped colorless Omen artifact token with “{T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]
{1}{R}{R}: Adoroth, the Baneful deals 4 damage to any target. Activate only if you have no cards in hand.
